title: Assistant Director of Development
description: Responsible for gift fundraising and increasing alumni engagement.

title: Assistant Vice Chancellor for Crisis, Reputation and Issues Management
description: Leads crisis communication strategies to protect university reputation.

title: Research Assistant, Senior (Warren Center, Plumley Lab)
description: Conducts high-throughput screening assays of small molecule modulators.

title: Assistant Director of Campus Services
description: Manages facilities operations including keys, fleet, waste management.

title: Assistant Director of Research Finance - Grants Management
description: Leads grant reconciliation and oversight for sponsored research projects.

title: Assistant Dean for Career Services, Law School
description: Oversees career placement strategies and employer relationships.

title: Assistant Director, Student Center for Social Justice and Identity
description: Supports multicultural and international students with programming.

title: Research Assistant
description: Supports behavioral experiments and lab operations in Psychology Dept.

title: Assistant To The Dean
description: Provides administrative support to the Dean of Divinity School.

title: Accounting Assistant
description: Manages purchase requisitions and invoice reconciliations.

title: Executive Assistant
description: Provides high-level communication support, project management, scheduling, and executive-level administrative services within Development and Alumni Relations (DAR). Supports two Assistant Vice Chancellors and manages logistics for meetings, travel, budgets, and confidential projects.

title: Assistant Dean for Admissions, Law School
description: Leads the law school's admissions office, including recruitment, strategy, scholarship awards, and oversight of J.D., LL.M., and MLS admissions. Ensures ABA compliance and drives data-informed enrollment initiatives.

title: Research Assistant, Molecular Physiology and Biophysics (Mchaourab Lab)
description: Assists in molecular biology and protein biochemistry studies focusing on neurotransmitter sodium symporters. Works with advanced spectroscopy, cryo-EM, and structural models.

title: Research Assistant, Pharmacology
description: Performs equipment maintenance, research support, administrative coordination, and scientific logistics in the Department of Pharmacology. Supports faculty and resource users with purchasing, compliance, and lab operations.

title: DAR Assistant, Law
description: Supports alumni relations and fundraising operations for Vanderbilt Law School. Manages scheduling, event coordination, donor relations, office budgeting, and database reporting.

title: Research Assistant, Molecular Physiology and Biophysics (Chen Lab)
description: Supports research on epigenetically modified cancer cell lines through vector construction, transfection, and molecular characterization. Also oversees lab organization and safety compliance.
